findings.title: Deployer cannot mint any new tokens
findings.description: The owner can mint until minting is finished and to avoid minting _mintingFinished should be True.

findings.title: MintingFinished State Variable Is Still False
findings.description: The mintingFinished state variable remains False, allowing the owner to still mint tokens.

findings.title: Unrestricted Token Burning
findings.description: Everybody can burn tokens when they have tokens, which will decrease the total supply of tokens.

findings.title: Nobody can burn tokens from other addresses without allowance
findings.description: It ensures that token burning is restricted to the owner of the tokens and requires explicit allowance for others to burn tokens on their behalf.
